content.description:
The Land of Thrace

Terra procul vastisvastus, -a, -um, adj. = magnus, -a, -um colitur MavortiaMavortius, -a, -um, adj.: of or belonging to Mars campis 
(ThracesThrax, Thracis, m.: Thracian arantaro, -are: to farm) acri quondamquondam = olim regnataregno, -are, -avi, -atus = rego, -ere LycurgoLycurgus, -i, m.: Lycurgus (a male name), 
hospitiumhospitium, -i, n.: ally antiquum Troiae sociique PenatesPenates, -ium, m. pl.: Penates (household gods) 
dum fortuna fuit.
